thread.title: Your guide to using Google Assistant and the Google search app on Android & iPhone
thread.title_full: Your guide to using Google Assistant and the Google search app on Android & iPhone

author: Danny Sullivan
title: Your guide to using Google Assistant and the Google search app on Android & iPhone
text:
Google Assistant is coming widely to Android phones. Here's how to use it and other ways to Google on your smartphone -- even for iPhone users.

Please visit Marketing Land for the full article.
